title: User Authentication with Social Login Success
description: Verify that users can authenticate successfully using social login and a user profile is created.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Click on a supported social login (e.g., Google, Facebook)
Complete social login authentication
Verify user is redirected to the profile creation page if no profile exists
Fill and save user profile form
Verify the user profile is stored and user is logged in

title: User Authentication Failure with Invalid Social Login
description: Verify that social login fails gracefully and shows an error message on failure.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Attempt social login with invalid credentials or denied permissions
Verify error message indicating login failure is displayed
Verify user remains unauthenticated and on the login page

title: Event Creation Workflow
description: Verify that event organizers can create a new event with all required settings and save successfully.

steps.description: Login as event organizer
Navigate to the admin events creation page
Fill in event details including title, description, date/time, location, and ticketing
Configure event settings, registration limits, and media uploads
Save the new event
Verify event is listed in the organizer's events dashboard
Verify event details are correctly saved and retrievable

title: Event Creation Validation Errors
description: Verify validation errors are shown when mandatory event fields are missing or invalid during event creation.

steps.description: Login as event organizer
Navigate to event creation page
Attempt to save event with missing required fields (e.g., title, date)
Verify appropriate validation error messages are displayed for each missing/invalid field
Enter invalid data formats (e.g., past date, invalid ticket price)
Verify validation prevents saving and shows relevant messages

title: Event Registration Normal Flow
description: Verify that users can register for an event, select ticket options, complete payment via Stripe, and receive QR-coded tickets.

steps.description: Login as a registered user
Navigate to an event public page
Fill event registration form including guest details if applicable
Select ticket options and proceed to payment
Complete payment using Stripe test card
Verify registration status updates to confirmed
Verify user receives confirmation with QR code ticket

title: Event Registration with Payment Failure
description: Verify system behavior when Stripe payment fails during event registration.

steps.description: Start event registration and fill the registration form
Attempt payment with a declined Stripe test card
Verify payment failure message is displayed
Verify registration is not confirmed and user is prompted to retry

title: QR Code Generation and Validation
description: Verify QR code is generated correctly post-registration and can be scanned for check-in.

steps.description: Complete a successful event registration
Verify QR code is included in the registration success page or email
Use QR code scanning system at check-in
Verify scanning the QR code authenticates the attendee and marks check-in as complete

title: Admin Dashboard Real-time Analytics Update
description: Verify that event analytics and reports in the admin dashboard update in real-time with accurate registration and check-in data.

steps.description: Login as admin
Navigate to event analytics dashboard
Trigger event registrations and check-ins from different users
Verify registration and attendance metrics update immediately and correctly
Verify reports generate correct data for the specified date ranges and filters

title: Search and Filtering Functionality for Events
description: Verify that searching and filtering events and registrants return relevant results quickly and accurately.

steps.description: Login as user or admin
Enter search queries with event titles, dates, or organizer names
Verify that filtered list only contains matching events
Apply filters such as event date range, ticket status, or location
Verify results adhere to applied filters

title: Multi-tenant Data Isolation Enforcement
description: Verify that data for different tenants is isolated with no leakage across organizations.

steps.description: Login as tenant A user and create events, registrations, and upload media
Verify all actions are scoped only to tenant A data and not visible to others
Login as tenant B user
Verify tenant B cannot access tenant A's events, registrations, or media
Attempt cross-tenant API calls with tenant A token on tenant B endpoints
Verify access is denied with appropriate error messages

title: Email Notification Sending and Template Accuracy
description: Verify that system sends automated email notifications for event actions with correct templates and content.

steps.description: Trigger registration confirmation email via successful event registration
Verify receiving email contains correct event details, registration info, and QR code
Trigger reminder or update emails via admin dashboard
Verify email contents use appropriate templates and dynamic content
Trigger failure scenarios such as invalid email addresses
Verify system logs errors and does not crash

title: Media Upload and Association with Events
description: Verify that media files can be uploaded and correctly linked to events in the media management system.

steps.description: Login as event organizer
Navigate to media management page for a selected event
Upload various media files (images, documents) with valid types and sizes
Verify media files are uploaded successfully and appear in event media list
Attempt to upload disallowed file types or files exceeding max size
Verify proper validation errors prevent upload

title: Admin Navigation and Usage Tracking
description: Verify the admin dashboard navigation menus work correctly and usage metrics track interaction data.

steps.description: Login as admin user
Use navigation to access different admin pages such as events dashboard, reports, usage management
Verify pages load correctly with expected content
Verify usage metrics for navigation clicks and page visits are recorded
Check usage reports show updated data matching admin interactions

title: Handling No Search Results
description: Verify the UI correctly handles searches yielding no results.

steps.description: Perform event or registration search with criteria known not to match any records
Verify the UI displays a user-friendly message indicating no results found
Verify no errors or UI breakage occurs
